site_name: Former Hotel Antoinette18-32 And 23-43 Beaufort Road AndFassett RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT1 2TQ
description: Details required by Condition 16 (Landscaping Scheme), Condition 18 (Street Furniture and Planting Features), Condition 20 (Materials for Hard Surfaced Areas) and Condition 21(The Play Space) of Planning Permission 18/12928/FUL (Demolition of 20-30 Beaufort Road and 25-41 Fassett Road and hotel buildings to rear. Refurbishment and conversion of 18 and 32 Beaufort Road and 23 and 43 Fassett Road, and erection of new buildings to provide a total of 20 houses and 69 flats, together with basement and surface car parking and landscaping (Revision to planning permission15/12107/FUL))
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are unacceptable and Condition 16, 18, 20 & 21 cannot be discharged.The plans provided are unacceptable and show an incorrect layout to that approved under 18/12928/FUL.
Please be advised that a fee of Â£3120 is required for this application. This can be paid either online at www.kingston.gov.uk or by calling our Customer Service Team on 020 8547 5002
